QuestData.Title: Firefight
QuestData.Description: It is... too late for me. Burned to all but the core. I have lived eons ... yet still my end seems sudden.$B$BNew life can spring from old. I still have wisdom to pass on. Please... do not let them take me before my work is done.$B$BKeep the tormentors at bay... just a little longer, $c.$B$BGive me minutes, and I will give you a thousand lifetimes.
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill 5 Fiery Tormentors to keep them from Nordu.
QuestData.CompletionText: Are you there, $c? My vision is failing... I hear fighting...
QuestData.RewardText: Thank you, $r.$B$BI am ready now.$B$BAll that I am, and all that this forest once was... it is now yours.
